itinerary.name: NYC Art & Food Tour
itinerary.description: Explore the rich art scene and diverse cuisine of Manhattan on this 3-mile walking and subway tour.

venues.name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
venues.description: Immerse yourself in world-class art collections spanning over 5,000 years of history.

venues.name: Whitney Museum of American Art
venues.description: Discover contemporary American art through innovative exhibitions and programs.

venues.name: Gagosian Gallery
venues.description: Experience cutting-edge contemporary art in a chic gallery setting.

venues.name: Le Bernardin
venues.description: Indulge in exquisite French seafood dishes at this Michelin-starred restaurant.

venues.name: Katz's Delicatessen
venues.description: Savor iconic New York deli sandwiches at this legendary establishment.
venues.location: 205 E Houston St, New York, NY 10002

routes.directions: Take the downtown A train to 14th St
Walk east on W 24th St, then north on 7th Ave
Take the downtown E train to 2nd Ave
